mcType: Monte Carlo method: mod-mv, mv, or n
mdType: Dynamics method: mod-mv, mv, or n
mass: Mass of each bead: int or float
a: Potential nuclear coupling: int or float
delta: Potential electronic coupling: int or float
Nsteps: Number of MC steps: int or float (casted to int so 1E6 will work)
Ntrajs: Number of MD trajectories to run per job: integer
Nslices: Number of MC jobs to run (remember to update subjobs.sh): integer
Nruns: Number of MD jobs to run (remember to update subjobs.sh): integer
time: Time for MD runs in A.U.: float
delt: Time step for MD runs: float
Nprint: Print (MC and MD) every this many steps: integer
intype: MD integrator type: vv or rk4
